ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Of all beings, do you lie with males,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Why do you go for males unlike all other creatures
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: What, of all creation will you go to (fornicate with) the males,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do you, in the world, want to have carnal relations with males
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “What! Among all the creatures, you commit the immoral acts with men?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Go you in unto the males of Al-`Alamin (people),"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! do you come to the males from among the creatures
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, do you come to male beings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: What! Of all creatures do ye come unto the males,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do you, of all people, approach males,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Go ye in, of all creatures, unto the males?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: What! Of all people do you come to males,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Of all the creatures in the world, will ye approach males,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Go you in unto the males of the 'Alamin (mankind),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, do you come to the males of the world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do you approach the males of the world?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do you approach males among the worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:165] What! Of all people you come unto males [to fornicate],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: What! Of all creatures do ye come unto the males) for sexual intercourse,
